entries.journal_entry_description: You've agreed to relieve a treasure hunter of a crystal shard he claims has brought him nothing but bad luck. Could it really be cursed?
entries.task00_message_box_text: As soon as you take the shard in your hand, you get the feeling that you made the wrong decision accepting it. Not really sure what to do with it, you put it away for now. Maybe it will become useful later.
entries.task02_message_box_text: Suddenly your backpack becomes really warm. As you take it off and look inside, you see the that the crystal Menth Paul gave you earlier is glowing red, sizzling and melting things around it. When you cover your hands and reach for it, it all of a sudden stops glowing and is now cold to the touch, like what you just saw had never happened.
entries.task05_message_box_text: That was strange, almost like the crystal that Menth Paul gave you called for those creatures...
entries.task07_message_box_text: Suddenly the crystal that you were given by Menth Paul a while ago springs to life. It's emitting a sharp sound that pierces your ears for a few seconds... Then it goes quiet again, like nothing had ever happened.
entries.task10_message_box_text: That was strange, almost like the crystal that Menth Paul gave you called for those creatures...
entries.task11_journal_entry_description: You're not sure what to do with the supposedly 'cursed' shard, and have decided to just hold onto it until you can figure something out.
